name: timestamp
description: The timestamp for the beginning of the bar.

name: open
description: The opening price for the bar.

name: high
description: The highest price during the bar.

name: low
description: The lowest price during the bar.

name: close
description: The closing price for the bar.

name: volume
description: The trading volume for the bar.

name: trade_count
description: The number of trades during the bar.

name: vwap
description: The volume-weighted average price for the bar.
